channel.title: The Ultimate Showdown Thread
channel.description:
So, this is war. And you have to post an image of something that could defeat/beat/destroy the image above.
So for pure example, If I were to post a picture of Santa, then the next guy could post a picture of a chainsaw, or the Grinch.
[b]Also as some rules: [/b]
[u]No endless loops (rock paper scissors)[/u]
[u]No repeating of images that portrays the same thing.[/u]
[u]Have to show what destroys is not just a destroyed picture of it (if they put a vase, the other person needs to put something like a hammer, not just a broken vase).[/u]
As for the no world destruction (nuke) rule, if someone does choose that try to think laterally. [u]But lets say you can't do that one. [/u] (Thanks Dr. Strangelove)
Let's start it off!
[img]https://cdn-write.demandstudios.com/upload//8000/900/70/9/28979.jpg[/img]

item.title: The Ultimate Showdown Thread
item.dc:creator: El_Chubba_Chubba
item.description:
So, this is war. And you have to post an image of something that could defeat/beat/destroy the image above.

So for pure example, If I were to post a picture of Santa, then the next guy could post a picture of a chainsaw, or the Grinch.

Also as some rules:

No endless loops (rock paper scissors)

No repeating of images that portrays the same thing.

Have to show what destroys is not just a destroyed picture of it (if they put a vase, the other person needs to put something like a hammer, not just a broken vase).

As for the no world destruction (nuke) rule, if someone does choose that try to think laterally.
But lets say you can’t do that one. (Thanks Dr. Strangelove)

Let’s start it off!

Read full topic
